results.definition: a concavity in a surface produced by pressing
examples: he left the impression of his fingers in the soft mud

results.definition: a symbol that is the result of printing or engraving

examples: I wanted to create an impression of success

results.definition: a clear and telling mental image
examples: the events left a permanent impression in his mind

results.definition: all the copies of a work printed at one time
a vague idea in which some confidence is placed
examples: his impression of her was favorable

results.definition: an impressionistic portrayal of a person
examples: he did a funny impression of a politician

results.definition: (dentistry) an imprint of the teeth and gums in wax or plaster
examples: the dentist took an impression for use in preparing an inlay

results.definition: the act of pressing one thing on or into the surface of another
examples: he watched the impression of the seal on the hot wax
